council_profile.name: Wyre Council
council_profile.covers: Wyre district in north-west Lancashire, including Fleetwood, Thornton-Cleveleys, Garstang and Poulton-le-Fylde
notable_issues: Highest supplier concentration (HHI 2,797) of all 15 Lancashire councils
Finance department routes 510M through only 17 suppliers (75.7%% of total spend)
Fleetwood — former fishing port, significant regeneration needs
Coastal flooding risk — major flood defence programme
Benford Law deviation 7.6%% — above warning threshold

data_quality.transparency_notes: Wyre Council publishes spending data over £500.

cross_council_context.note: Wyre Council is a district council in Lancashire. Comparable to other Lancashire district councils.
